reviewText: Great product quality and  content of the subject  information and presentation by the author were super.  I would purchase this type item again.

I was so looking forward to this video, I saw it on a PBS, TV Special.  But, found that I do not have the right decoder on my TV or computer to play this particular DVD so it is useless at this point.  So frustrating!!!
I am new to beekeeping and found this book filled with a lot of helpful information.  I would definitely recommend it to anyone who is interested in raising bees in a natural way.
I really enjoyed the video, gives some neat ideas. What is the Food grade sheet he has on the top of hive? Where do I get some?
WAS GREAT LEARNED ALOT!! VERY SIMPLE TEACHING,THEY DID AGREAT JOB!! THANK YOU

Good beginners video.  Contained interesting background information, particularly as pertains to the history of beekeeping and the growing problem of pests and disease.  More graphics would "punch up" the production a bit.  Overall, a worthwhile purchase.
Informative video for beginners and experts

I really enjoyed the video and found it helpful and informative.  My one complaint is that instead of explaining what he was doing he had music.  While the music was lovely I bought the video to learn more about bee keeping not listen to music. The explanation of how to make meade and beeswax by products was quite interesting and useful.

This DVD covers an approach to beekeeping from A to Z.  In the world of beekeeping, there are as many ways to keep bees as there are beekeepers; this approach is a no harm approach and has a lot of tips to offer experienced beekeepers as well as newbees.
The DVD arrived quicker than expected. I got it for my husband for a Valentine present. Talks about natural beekeeping + tips on making lip balm, candles, honey straws, etc
